definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: move, proceed, advance (NH Hiph.; As. etêku as H., also trans. bring, move; Ar. 9ataqa, 9atuqa precede, pass forth, become free, grow old; Aram. 9teq, [[עֲתַק]] grow old, Palm. adj. [[עתק]] old);—
advance (in years; Aramaic sense) Job 21:7 (‖[[יִחְיוּ]]); hence = grow old and weak Ps 6:8 (of eye, ‖[[עָֽשְׁשָׁה]]).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הֶעְתִּיקוּ]] Job 32:16 (Gi; van d. H. Baer v:15), Pr 25:1; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּעְתֵּק]] Ge 12:8, Ge 26:22; Pt. [[מַעְתִּיק]] Job 9:5; —
move forward (sc. tent) = proceed Ge 12:8 ([[מִשָּׁם]], [[ה]] loc.), Ge 26:22 ([[מִשָּׁם]]); so fig. Job 32:16 (v. supr.) words have moved away from them ([[מֵהֶם]]), but v. prob. gloss (Bu al.).
very late Pr 25:1 transcribe (remove from one book or roll to another; LXX e)cegra/yanto, Vulgate transtulerunt; so in mediaeval Heb.: Zunz:ZMG xxv (1871), 447 f. = Ges. Schr. iii. 66 f.).
